name: Chippr Chirping
description:
• Title: Chippr Chirping
  • Controls:
    • WASD - Movement
    • Space - Jump
  • Goal: A little bird unable to fly dreams of seeing the world from up above, help him get there atop the clouds, stay off the ground as long as you can!
  • My Contribution:
    • In this project I did both all of the programming and some of the art assets. Taking the raycast from my team game EverCore I applied the same technique to the ground and the clouds to detect the jumping. Specifically in this project I learned how to use and implement a type of design pattern called a singleton from my time working with MassDigi on Bewitching Boba. Since a singleton is allowed only one instance of itself to be present at a time its great for things like save data or access data stored across functions or objects.
